title: BetonQuest击杀任务的问题
author: vincent_yo233
txt_content: BetonQuest击杀任务怎么显示已击杀怪物数量

replies.txt_content:
最后面有notify就会有数量提示

1只兔子: 'mmobkill cs amount:1 events:测试 label:mythicmobs notify'

replies.author: gouj511
replies.txt_content: 就用betonquest自带的point变量就可以实现

replies.author: vincent_yo233
replies.txt_content: 可以举个例子吗 wiki里没找到
